elements.name: To check if POST API creates new records for discount class

steps.name: the discount application is running
I Set POST discount service api endpoint
add the upcid for discount as 9899899899
add the category for discount as "CucumberCateg"
add the name for discount as "CucumberName"
add the brand for discount as "CucumberBrand"
add the originalprice for discount as 5.55
add the discountprice for discount as 2.55
add the aisleNumber for discount as 3
I send a POST request for discount
the response status code for discount should be 200

elements.name: To check if GET API is displaying all the records for discount inventory

steps.name: the discount application is running
I request all discounts from inventory
the response status code for discount should be 200

elements.name: To check if GET API is displaying records with given UPCID

steps.name: the discount application is running
I request discount details with upcid 9899899899
the response status code for discount should be 200
the upcid of record 0 for discount GET should be 9899899899
the category of record 0 for discount GET should be "CucumberCateg"
the name of record 0 for discount GET should be "CucumberName"
the brand of record 0 for discount GET should be "CucumberBrand"
the originalprice of record 0 for discount GET should be 5.550000190734863
the discountprice of record 0 for discount GET should be 2.549999952316284

elements.name: To check if PUT API is working as expected for discount

steps.name: the discount application is running
I Set PUT discount service api endpoint
I update the discount details for the upcid 9899899899
I send a PUT request for discount
the response status code for discount should be 200
the upcid of record 0 for discount GET should be 9899899899
the category of record 0 for discount GET should be "CucumberCateg"
the name of record 0 for discount GET should be "CucumberName"
the brand of record 0 for discount GET should be "CucumberBrand"
the originalprice of record 0 for discount GET should be 5.550000190734863
the discountprice of record 0 for discount GET should be 3.11

elements.name: Deleting a Discount by UPCID

steps.name: the discount application is running
I request to delete the discount with upcid 9899899899
the response status code for discount should be 200
the response message for discount deletion should be "Expired Product Thrown Away. Customer First Approach."

arguments.val: "Expired Product Thrown Away. Customer First Approach."

elements.name: To check if POST API creates new records for expiry class

steps.name: the expiry application is running
I Set POST expiry service api endpoint
add the upcid for expiry as 9899899899
add the category for expiry as "CucumberCateg"
add the name for expiry as "CucumberName"
add the brand for expiry as "CucumberBrand"
add the aisleNumber for expiry as 5
add the dateOfExpiry for expiry as "2024-07-09"
I send a POST request for expiry
the response status code for expiry should be 200

elements.name: To check if GET API is displaying all the records for expiry inventory

steps.name: the expiry application is running
I request all expired list from inventory
the response status code for expiry should be 200

elements.name: To check if GET API is displaying expiry records with given UPCID

steps.name: the expiry application is running
I request expiry details with upcid 9899899899
the response status code for expiry should be 200
the upcid of record 0 for expiry GET should be 9899899899
the category of record 0 for expiry GET should be "CucumberCateg"
the name of record 0 for expiry GET should be "CucumberName"
the brand of record 0 for expiry GET should be "CucumberBrand"
the date of expiry of record 0 for expiry GET should be "2024-07-09T04:00:00.000"

elements.name: To check if GET API is displaying expiry records with given date of expiry

steps.name: the expiry application is running
I request expiry details with expiry date "2024-07-09T04:00:00.000"

the upcid of record 0 for expiry should be 9899899899
the category of record 0 for expiry should be "CucumberCateg"
the name of record 0 for expiry should be "CucumberName"
the brand of record 0 for expiry should be "CucumberBrand"
the date of expiry of record 0 for expiry should be "2024-07-09T04:00:00.000"

elements.name: To check if PUT API is working as expected for expiry

steps.name: the expiry application is running
I Set PUT expiry service api endpoint
I update the expiry details for the upcid 9899899899
I send a PUT request for expiry
the response status code for expiry should be 200
the upcid of record 0 for expiry GET should be 9899899899

the name of record 0 for expiry GET should be "CucumberName"

elements.name: Deleting a expiry by UPCID

steps.name: the expiry application is running
I request to delete the expiry with upcid 9899899899
the response status code for expiry should be 200

elements.name: To check if POST API creates new records

steps.name: the product application is running
I Set POST product service api endpoint
add the category as "CucumberCateg"
add the name as "CucumberName"
add the brand as "CucumberBrand"
add the price as 5.55
add the quantity as 5
add the date of procurement as "2024-03-09"
add the date of expiry as "2024-07-09"
set the difference as 4
add the aisle number as "7"
I send a POST request for product
the response status code for product should be 201

elements.name: To check if GET API is displaying all the records for product inventory

steps.name: the product application is running
I request all products from inventory
the response status code for product should be 202

elements.name: To check if GET API is displaying records with given Category

steps.name: the product application is running
I request product details with category "CucumberCateg"
the response status code for product should be 200
the category of record 0 should be "CucumberCateg"
the name of record 0 should be "CucumberName"
the brand of record 0 should be "CucumberBrand"
the price of record 0 should be 5.55
the quantity of record 0 should be 5
the date of procurement of record 0 should be "2024-03-09T05:00:00.000"
the date of expiry of record 0 should be "2024-07-09T04:00:00.000"

elements.name: Deleting a Product by UPCID and aisleNumber

steps.name: the product application is running
I request to delete the product with upcid 9899899899 and aisleNumber "7"
the response status code for product should be 200
the response message for product deletion should be "Expired Product Thrown Away. Customer First Approach."

elements.name: To check if POST API creates new records

steps.name: the application is running
I Set POST supplier service api endpoint
add the brand name as "Cucumber1"
add the supplier email as "Cucumber1@example.com"
add the supplier contact as "+1 111-111-1111"
I send a POST request
the response status code should be 200

elements.name: To check if GET API is displaying all the records

steps.name: the application is running
I request all suppliers
the response status code should be 200

elements.name: To check if GET API is displaying records with given brandname

steps.name: the application is running
I request supplier details with brandname "Cucumber1"
the response status code should be 200
the brand name of record 0 should be "Cucumber1"
the supplier email of record 0 should be "clubhouse.supplier1@example.com"
the supplier contact of record 0 should be "+1 604-555-5679"

elements.name: To check if PUT API is working as expected

steps.name: the application is running
I Set PUT supplier service api endpoint
I update the supplier details for the brand name "Cucumber1"
I send a PUT request
the response status code should be 200
the brand name of record 0 should be "Cucumber1"
the supplier email of record 0 should be "clubhouse.supplier1@example.com"
the supplier contact of record 0 should be "+1 604-555-5679"

elements.name: Deleting a Supplier by Brand Name

steps.name: the application is running
I request to delete the supplier with brand name "Cucumber1"
the response status code should be 200
the response message should be "Expired Product Thrown Away. Customer First Approach."

arguments.val: "Expired Product Thrown Away. Customer First Approach."
